title: EPSO - The Ultimate Test Book 2012 Assistant
description:
Yup, I'm still alive even though a 41 year-old KiD...

Couldn't find this anywhere - tried to get a job at EPSO last year, got very good marks but they didn't like my qualifications - sure, I was too damn good compared to their fucking good-for-nothing corporate shithead employees.

Anyway, bought this from a loser on okazii.ro for about 10 Euro and I OCR-ized it with Adobe Acrobat Professional (what else?)

Some advice regarding EPSO competitions - they only check the qualifications you specified on the application form AFTER you pass their psychometric tests. Tried this for the first time in 2011 WITHOUT knowing anything about this shit and I almost passed but last year, after studying this book carefully I managed to get 8/10 in verbal reasoning and 9/10 in numerical.

If you wanna give it a try, they organize the so-called competitions every year or so, but vacancies for specific position appear every 3 years or so, according to their needs.

4EVER & EVER
AGAIN & ALWAYS
Too hot to be REAL
And too COOL to be ALIVE

Danny KiD
